titleText: You are not alone, and you have options! Choose a path to explore.

College.title: College
College.hoverText: Having a college degree increases your average yearly income by 70 percent
College.transitionTitleText: Higher education is accessible to you! College has so many options, we are gonna begin with 2 year v 4 year colleges
resourceText: 2 year colleges are a very financailly accessible option. They are open to everyone and are government funded and cost less than a 4 year insitition. There is lots of aid, and you can transfer to a 4 year afterwards

4 year colleges are more selective than 2 year colleges. They some require entrance exams, have application fees, essays, and have higher tution. However there is lots of aid if need! You are not alone
College.titleText: You are not alone, and you have options! Choose a path to explore

Two-Year.title: Two-Year
Two-Year.hoverText: At a 2-year college, you are able to earn you associates degree. It is one step above a high school diploma but one below a bachelors
Two-Year.conclusionText: Now that we have identified the 2 year insititions path, foster feed friends offers resources and mentors for you to succeed!

Four-Year.title: Four-Year
Four-Year.hoverText: At a 4-year institution, you are able to earn you bachelors degree. It is wildly accepted and in some cases required for jobs with more specialization
Four-Year.transitionTitleText: Now that we have honed in on 4 year insititions, we must view at the avalabile options. A new option arises Public v. Private Insititons
resourceText: Public colleges have funding from the government. They typically have lower cost of attendence. However, there is more flexibility with financial aid with private insititions

Public.title: Public
Public.hoverText: Public colleges/universitits tend to be larger, offer more financail aid.
Public.conclusionText: Now that we have identified the 4 year Public insititions path, foster feed friends offers resources and mentors for you to succeed!

Private.title: Private
Private.hoverText: Private insitutios have more control over financail aid, general schooling requirements, and some are considered more prestigious (ie. Ivy League)
Private.conclusionText: Now that we have honed in on 4 year private insititions path, foster feed friends offers resources and mentors for you to succeed!

Military.title: Military
Military.hoverText: The military offers many benefits after a certain time frame of service. It is a large commitment
Military.transitionTitleText: The military is an option for you. There are mulitple branches under the military that could be appealing to you.
resourceText: The militiary is a big commitment, with rewards. Each branch is distinct and offers their own set of requritments. Some have academies which are selective, and have entrance requirements.
Military.titleText: You are not alone, and you have options! Choose a path to explore

Navy.title: Navy
Navy.hoverText: The United States Navy is the maritime service branch of the United States Armed Forces. It is  principally designated for naval and amphibious warfare; namely, lake-borne, riverine, littoral, or ocean-borne combat operations and related functions.
Navy.conclusionText: Now that we have identified the Navy path, foster feed friends offers resources and mentors for you to succeed!

Army.title: Army
Army.hoverText: The United States Army is the land service branch of the United States Armed Forces. It is the land-based military branch, service branch or armed service of a nation or state
Army.conclusionText: Now that we have identified the Army path, foster feed friends offers resources and mentors for you to succeed!

Marines.title: Marines
Marines.hoverText: The United State Marine Corps the maritime land force service branch of the United States Armed Forces responsible for conducting expeditionary and amphibious operations, through combined arms, implementing its own infantry, armor, artillery, aerial and special operations forces.
Marines.conclusionText: Now that we have identified the Marines path, foster feed friends offers resources and mentors for you to succeed!

Air Force.title: Air Force
Air Force.hoverText: Having a college degree increases your average yearly income by 70 percent
Air Force.conclusionText: Now that we have identified the Air Force path, foster feed friends offers resources and mentors for you to succeed!

Work Force.title: Work Force
Work Force.hoverText: These jobs have minimal educational requirements, and can range in pay starting at minimum wage
Work Force.transitionTitleText: Entering the workforce right away is a great way to start earning money from the get go! You can explore various workforve jobs below
resourceText: There are many sectors to the workforce, finding a job that you are interested in and you meet the qualifications is key! Know your brand :)
Work Force.titleText: You are not alone, and you have options! Choose a path to explore

Food Service.title: Food Service
Food Service.hoverText: This includes jobs like cooks, servers, and fast food workers. They can range in pay and sophisitication level.
Food Service.conclusionText: Now that we have identified the food service work force, foster feed friends offers resources and mentors for you to succeed!

Office.title: Office
Office.hoverText: Office jobs are a great way of expanding your network and also refining your professional skills.
Office.conclusionText: Now that we have identified the office path, foster feed friends offers resources and mentors for you to succeed!

Sales.title: Sales
Sales.hoverText: This is a great way to expand your customer service skills, along with continuing to build great relationships with coworkers.
Sales.conclusionText: Now that we have identified the sales path, foster feed friends offers resources and mentors for you to succeed!

Manual Labor.title: Manual Labor
Manual Labor.hoverText: Manual labor is typically one of the higher paying jobs; there are various agencies that offer guidance.
Manual Labor.conclusionText: Now that we have identified the manual labor path, foster feed friends offers resources and mentors for you to succeed!

Technical School.title: Technical School
Technical School.hoverText: This is an option to learn a trade or specific skill. They range in time periods, but offer a very direct path to job options
Technical School.transitionTitleText: Technical Schools can be bootcamps or other trainings that specify a specific skill/trade
resourceText: These technical schools can be run as an extension of a college or university. They offer certification of specialization usually or some type of acknowledgement of work
Technical School.titleText: You are not alone, and you have options! Choose a path to explore

Online.title: Online
Online.hoverText: In the age of zoom, this allows you to study at any insitution from your home while working or intering or simply studying
Online.conclusionText: Now that we have identified the Navy path, foster feed friends offers resources and mentors for you to succeed!

In-Person.title: In-Person
In-Person.hoverText: In person schooling usually is more hands-on and is extremely specialized like cosmetology and nursing
In-Person.conclusionText: Now that we have identified the Army path, foster feed friends offers resources and mentors for you to succeed!
